text.0: from fervour kindled to its height eternal law and truth were born.
text.1: thence was the night produced and thence the billowy flood of sea arose.
text.2: from that same billowy flood of sea the year was afterwards produced.
text.3: ordainer of the days nights lord over all who close the eye.
text.4: dhātar the great creator then formed in due order sun and moon.
text.5: he formed in order heaven and earth the regions of the air and light.
